alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 12 at 2:27PM MST until March 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County including Interstate 25 between Wheatland and Chugwater, South Laramie Range, and South Laramie Range Foothills including Interstate 80 between Cheyenne and Laramie. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Saturday. Winds will increase overnight and into the early to midday hours Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers, with a high risk for blow overs.
info.instruction: There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways. In addition, areas of blowing snow could lead to reduced visibility, even whiteout conditions, and slick roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
